GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.10.110
GSD.description:
mtd: rawnand: atmel: fix refcount issue in atmel_nand_controller_init

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit a3587259ae553e41d1ce8c7435351a5d6b299a11, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit f88fc122cc34c2545dec9562eaab121494e401ef. For more details please see the references link.
